certifications.name: Advanced React
certifications.description: Create robust and reusable components with advanced techniques, interact with remote servers via APIs, test React applications with React Testing Library, and integrate commonly used React libraries.

certifications.name: Learn Typescript
certifications.description: A solid understanding of TypeScript fundamentals to create safer and more reliable JavaScript applications, including data validation, unit testing, debugging, and software design patterns.

certifications.name: TypeScript Operators
certifications.description: Describe the purpose of different types of TypeScript operators, practice code in TypeScript playground, and understand arithmetic, logical, assignment, and comparison operators.

certifications.name: TypeScript Variables and Data Types
certifications.description: Learn TypeScript variables and different ways to declare them, understand differences between var, let and const, scope of variables, and TypeScript data types.
